Text:
Ending is cut off on this one, which means it's also the case for the source file, as the regular xvid uploads (TLA) have the ending abruptly cut off as well. And it's a very obvious cutoff, music cut is abrupt, no fade out, no end credits and if the ending is faithful to the book... actually missing dialogue.

Thanks for the up though! I hope there will be a truly complete version of this last episode eventually, and I'm not complaining... I genuinely appreciate all the effort put into this.
